row.process:
:SET &WORKGDVUPLOAD# = '&LOGSRV#/&SUBSYS#/input/GDV_Upload/Leben' :SET &HISTGDVUPLOAD# = '&LOGSRV#/&SUBSYS#/input/GDV_Upload/Archiv/Leben' :SET &TAG#=SUBSTR(&TIMESTAMP_AM#, 1, 8)
! --------- ! [CR21416] ! --------- if [ "$(ls -A &HISTGDVUPLOAD#)" ] then echo " -> Alle, bis auf die letzte Sicherung aus &HISTGDVUPLOAD# loeschen:" typeset -i bro_cnt bro_cnt=$(ls -t1r &HISTGDVUPLOAD# | wc -l) echo " -> Das Verzeichnis &HISTGDVUPLOAD# enthaelt $bro_cnt Unterverzeichnisse." ls -t1r &HISTGDVUPLOAD# if [ $bro_cnt -gt 2 ] then bro_cnt=$bro_cnt-2 else bro_cnt=0 fi echo " -> loesche $bro_cnt Verzeichnisse:" ls -t1r &HISTGDVUPLOAD# | head -n $bro_cnt for file in $(ls -t1r &HISTGDVUPLOAD# | head -n $bro_cnt); do rm -vfr &HISTGDVUPLOAD#/$file; done fi ! --------- ! [CR21416] ! --------- if [ "$(ls -A &WORKGDVUPLOAD#)" ] then echo " -> Die Daten vom letzten Lauf von &WORKGDVUPLOAD# nach &HISTGDVUPLOAD# sichern:" mkdir -pv &HISTGDVUPLOAD#/&TAG# mv -vf &WORKGDVUPLOAD#/GDV-L* &HISTGDVUPLOAD#/&TAG# gzip -f &HISTGDVUPLOAD#/&TAG#/GDV-L-* fi
